metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8793 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain a Heap-Based BufferOverflow in function cssp_read_tsrequest() that results in a memorycorruption and probably even a remote code execution.

criterions.comment: rdesktop: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
